title: Spot the Loop
summary: Something repeated today. Name it. Ask why.
description: Some loops are helpful. Some aren't. You're not judging — you're just noticing which ones show up without invitation.

flow.\ud83c\udfaf Step 1: Drop a Signal: Message your AI: 'Loop scan 🔁: Here’s what I noticed today… [list any repeats]'
flow.\ud83d\udc41\ufe0f Step 2: Optional Prom: Ask: 'Any patterns you see?' or 'What might I be avoiding?'
flow.\ud83d\udcdc Step 3: Optional Scroll Ent: If a loop stands out, name it: 'Loop spotted: [X]' → Done.

optional_recast: Scan again tomorrow. Does the loop shift, repeat, or evolve?
absence_response: No loops noticed today. That’s okay. Not all loops want to be seen.
notes: You don’t have to fix the loop. Just seeing it weakens its hold.
Loop-mapping is a game of awareness — not effort.
This quest will feel different every time. That’s the point.

amplification.ai_mirror_prompt: Which behaviors are stabilizing or repeating more than expected?
amplification.loop_signal: Track what loops are seen but not yet changed.
amplification.miss_response: 🔄 The loop remained unseen today. That’s also data.
